summary: Build a single website that offers multiple generative AI activities: text-to-image, text-to-video, and image-to-video.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalistic three-icon set representing: text-to-image, text-to-video, image-to-video (tool-icons.dim_512x512.png)
- Simple wordmark logo, monochrome, clean geometric style (logo.dim_512x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page website that offers three distinct activities/tools: Text-to-Image, Text-to-Video, and Image-to-Video, with clear navigation (tabs or segmented control) to switch between them without leaving the page.

Implement a Text-to-Image activity UI that accepts a prompt (text), basic style controls (at least: aspect ratio and a simple style selector), and generates a downloadable image result using an on-device/demo generator (no external AI services).

Implement a Text-to-Video activity UI that accepts a prompt and simple motion controls (at least: duration and motion style) and generates a short downloadable demo video result locally in the browser (e.g., simple animated frames rendered to a video format supported by the browser).

Implement an Image-to-Video activity UI that allows the user to upload an image, select simple animation controls (at least: duration and animation style), and generates a short downloadable demo video by animating the uploaded image locally in the browser.

Add lightweight backend support (Motoko single-actor) to store a userâ€™s generation history metadata (activity type, prompt, timestamps, and client-generated artifact identifiers/filenames) and expose query/update methods so the frontend can display a recent history list per signed-in user.

Provide a coherent visual theme for the whole site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across all three activities and the history panel (avoid a blue/purple color scheme).
Add basic UX states for all generators: generating/in-progress state, success state with preview, and failure state with an English error message (e.g., if the browser cannot export a video).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a single website with multiple generator activities/tools
